http://seasonsfpm.com/vacation-rentals-2/the-big-lake-house/
Located at 3546 E. Upper Hayden Lake Road, The Big Lake House is the waterfront vacation home to top all other experiences. It has everything you need to have a luxury vacation in the Idaho sunshine and water.
You`ll have 6 bedrooms, of which 4 are master suites. All have posh, ultra-comfortable hotel-style beds and bedding. Nearly every room in this magnificent location is positioned for commanding views of Hayden Lake and the mountains beyond. There are three outdoor decks, with built-in grill, outdoor hot tub, and comfortable chairs for viewing the world below.
This home is accessed from a low-traffic road on the top, and the home covers 4 levels down toward the lake`s edge. There is a large living room and entertaining area on the third floor with high ceilings, skylights, and a chef`s kitchen with breakfast bar.
You`ll also enjoy the massive home theater and game room complete with its own bar. There is a workout room and sauna.
Please note the Big Lake Home is not currently equipped with any cable TV or WiFi - making this a true getaway.
The home comes with 75 feet of private waterfront frontage, which is accessed by crossing E Hayden Lake Road. Hayden Lake Marina is next door for watercraft launching, rental and services, as well as the Boathouse Restaurant.
This home has that ultimate escape feeling, but groceries and supplies are only a 10-minute drive away. This is what a true luxury vacation feels like!
Reach us now to reserve your dates at The Big Lake House and enjoy the time of your life.

I am offering my very nicely appointed 1 BR, 1 bath unit in Mountain View to vacationers for only $65/night. The taxes are included and I do not charge a cleaning fee for stays of 3 nights or longer.
The unit has laundry, a sweet view of Mauna Kea, and just about everything you need in the kitchen and bathroom. It`s location is pretty convenient for exploring this side of the island. The unit itself is very sweet and charming. I do a good job of cleaning it just for you. I live downstairs in a separate part of the house. I`ve had dozens of happy tenants and vacationers. I do not rent to anyone besides short-term vacationers.
Availability is WIDE OPEN. I will revise this listing when that changes. Stay tonight ! I take cash or Paypal.

postings.body:
Looking for a stay of three or four nights in your lovely city starting Oct 5th or 6th for swap or funds...or combination?
If you would like to swap dates for a stay for yourself for time in beautiful Victoria BC Canada on Vancouver Island- we have three lovely and unique vacation rentals for your stay. Does not have to be same time swap. Walk to the beach, walk the 565 acres of forest just steps away- find the castle nestled on the grounds- 20 mins from downtown Victoria.
Your welcome to catch our links to our suites on Tripadvisor/Flipkey via our website at :
http://elementsandinsights.ca
We are an easy going down to earth middle age couple who haven`t had a vacation in 5 yrs! ( Yeah! we are finally taking a vacation!! lol)
We are vacation rental owners/operators, corporate drones, musical conductor and intuitive life coach, gardener...
Would be just the two of us..don`t smoke..love cats/dogs- can take care of yours-
We can talk about pretty much any subject from business to the esoteric....can be social but do enjoy doing our own thing...
Pretty open to ideas for possible places to stay...garden suite, loft, in law, apartment, condo, boat, spare room,RV- open to ideas.... clean/tidy is high on our list...queen or king bed would be great... as hubby is 6"6...
Parking would be a big bonus as we are on a driving vacation. Open to sharing an apartment- but own bath is a must. Close to transit is great so we don`t have to find parking when we sightsee- downtown location even better.
If you would like to swap- or just know of a great place that won`t cost us a grand for our stay of three nights- please feel free to contact us! We have a toll free number for our business in contact area...
Pics are of our suites in Victoria British Columbia, Canada
